column4: someone help please.. i accidentally deleted my default user admin
i've created a new one however i cant get into my files.. cause i locked them
you deleted root?
not really but the other root.
there are 2 roots right after installation?
no, root and your user
just my user
then use adduser to add it back
whenever i do that home kidbuntu is my default before.. it says "home folder already exists" or user already exists
how did you delete your account?
opened" systems--->users----> users and groups
is there a way that i can accesss it by doing a chmod
i got a new admin now but the files are restricted.. i just want to have it again
sorry i'm confused now, you need to start from the begining
if your user account is gone, log in as root and re-add it. Otherwise it's wasn't deleted
i did the adduser "user" on recovery console. and this is is that i'm using now
why are you in a recovery console?
all of my users are messed up.. heres what i did. i have my default user admin before
i created a new one... on the second user i created i deleted the default first one. and i changed the home folder of the new one to my default one so i couldnt log in by gdm.
mhenley: yep, add the workspace switcher to the panel, then properties will let you change that
thats why i went over to the recovery console and created this new account..
